name: Arcadea
description:
'''Arcadea''' is an American [[synth-metal]] [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] from [[Atlanta]], formed in 2015 by [[Mastodon (band)|Mastodon]] drummer [[Brann Dailor]], Zruda guitarist [[Core Atoms]], and guitarist Raheem Amlani.
Arcadea's self-titled album was released in June 2017 via [[Relapse Records]].
